Goal: To check that user can log in with standard user.

Asserts:
1. Inventory page is opened - url changed to https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html
2. Opened within 2 secs

Goal: To check that error is displayed when username and password fields are empty

Steps:
2. Leave username empty
Leave password field empty

Asserts: 1. Error is displayed with text "Epic sadface: Username is required"

Goal: To check that error is displayed when username field is empty

Steps:
2. Leave username empty
Input to password field:
12345

Asserts: Error is displayed "Epic sadface: Username is required"

Goal: To check that error is displayed when pass is empty

Steps:
2. Input to username: 
12345
Leave password field empty

Asserts: Error is displayed "Epic sadface: Password is required"

Goal: To check that error is displayed when username does not exist

Asserts: Error is displayed "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"

Goal: To check that error is displayed when pass does not match usename

Steps:
2. Input to 
username: 
standard_user
password: 
test

Asserts: Error is displayed "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"
